title: and having complied with section 44D(4) of that Act, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 

2007 (Advanced Biofuel Obligation Rate) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (advanced biofuel obligation rate) order 2022 (2) order come operation 1 january 2023

title: and having complied with section 44D(4) of that Act, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The percentage rate referred to in section 44C(4) of the National Oil
text_raw:
2. The percentage rate referred to in section 44C(4) of the National Oil 
Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) in respect of the advanced biofuel 
obligation shall be 0.300 per cent. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [710] 3

title: and having complied with section 44D(4) of that Act, hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

To come into effect on 1 January 2023, this regulation establishes the 
percentage rate referred to in section 44C(4)(a) of the National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) to be 0.300 per cent. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [710]
